translations: 法西斯主义；极端国家主义

sentences.sentence: They heard the protesters shout: "No more fascism!"
sentences.translation: 他们听见抗议者在高呼：“打倒法西斯主义！”

sentences.sentence: Devout Marxists believed fascism was the "last stand of the bourgeoisie."
sentences.translation: 坚定的马克思主义者曾相信法西斯主义是资产阶级的“最后阵地”。

sentences.sentence: It is the 70th anniversary of both the world's anti-fascism war and the victory of China's Resistance War against Japanese Aggression this year.
sentences.translation: 今年是世界反法西斯战争胜利70周年，也是中国人民抗日战争胜利70周年。
